name: women and Child welfare Foundation

address: 402 B new Sonam samruddhi Golden Nest Phase one

briefDescription: WCWF is a non-profit org that exists for combat human trafficking. We taking stand against injustice, be a voice for those who cannot speak for themselves, and help rescue those that are trafficked and detained forcefully in brothels, we want to raise awareness about human trafficking, fight for justice, Woman and child welfare foundation keen to work and evolve for RRR (Rescue / Reintegration / Rehabilitation) of victims of trafficking , we  believes in preventing women and children from forced in prostitution which is the worst form of sexual slavery.We serve psycho-counseling, legal counseling  , provide rehabilitation services to rescued trafficked victims in govt shelter homes.
